00005 
00006   Contents:     A module to plot the number of muSC events per MIDAS block
00007 
00008 \********************************************************************/

00017 /* ROOT includes */
00018 #include <TH1I.h>

00030 INT  MPileUpPerBlock_init(void);

00032 
00033 extern HNDLE hDB;
00034 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00035 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00036 
00037 static TH1I* hPileUpPerBlock;
00038 
00039 // Time windows
00040 static const double pileup_tw = 10000.; // ns
00041 
00042 
00043 ANA_MODULE MPileUpPerBlock_module =
00044 {
00045   "MPileUpPerBlock",                    /* module name           */
00046   "John R Quirk",              /* author                */

00048   NULL,                          /* BOR routine           */

00054   NULL,                          /* initial parameters    */

00059 INT MPileUpPerBlock_init()
00060 {
00061   
00062   hPileUpPerBlock = new TH1I("hPileUpPerBlock","Number of Pile Up; Percent; Counts",100,0.,1);
00063   return SUCCESS;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 INT MPileUpPerBlock(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00068 {
00069 
00070   unsigned int nPileUp = 0;
00071 
00072   // We assume the existance of all necessary TPI vectors
00073   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >& tpis = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00074   std::map< std::string, std::string >& dets = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00075   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator iBank;
00076   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> *musc_pulses = NULL;
00077   std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator curr_musc_pulse, next_musc_pulse;
00078 
00079   for (iBank = tpis.begin(); iBank != tpis.end(); iBank++) {
00080     if (dets.at(iBank->first) == "muSC") {
00081       musc_pulses = &tpis.at(iBank->first);
00082       curr_musc_pulse = musc_pulses->begin();
00083       next_musc_pulse = curr_musc_pulse + 1;
00084     }
00085   }
00086 
00087   double cTime = 0;
00088   for (; curr_musc_pulse != musc_pulses->end();) {
00089     if ((*next_musc_pulse)->GetPulseTime() - (*curr_musc_pulse)->GetPulseTime() < pileup_tw)
00090       nPileUp++;
00091     curr_musc_pulse++;
00092     next_musc_pulse++;
00093   }
00094 
00095   hPileUpPerBlock->Fill(nPileUp);
00096 
00097   return SUCCESS;
00098 }
